pages.title: ℧ Ten of Cups ℧
pages.text: Spirit of Perpetual Success$(br)      ♂ Mars in ♓ Pisces

A vision of cups in a rainbow, like an arc of a bigger colorful mandala; it is contemplated in wonder and ecstasy by a couple below, evidently in love.$(br)  While embracing each other, one has their left arm raised upward; the other raises their right arm.$(br)  The two children dancing in the background have not observed the miracle but are happy by their own selves.$(br)  There is a cozy cottage in the woods beyond.

The ten cups here are symbols for the multiple possibilities of fantasy and life.$(br)  They appear neatly stacked in two rows, as if one set was the pair of the other.$(br)  The children show that contentment can also simply come from our own selves, rather than any miraculous occurrence.

$(l)Divinatory meanings$()$(br)  Happiness, joy, perfection of love and friendship.$(br)  A sense of contentment and inner peace. Repose of the entire heart.$(br2)$(l)Reversed$()$(br)  Indignation.$(br)  The quality of joy remains, but it may be false; there may be a need to search for it or look past momentary frustrations.
